entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
